product_name: Smith Smith Ridgeway Polarized Sunglasses - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Make a mountaintop sunset or a sunrise over the ocean even more breathtaking when you see it through the Ridgeway polarized sunglasses. They cut out the glare so all you have to do is admire the view.
short_description: Make a mountaintop sunset or a sunrise over the ocean even more breathtaking when you see it through the Ridgeway polarized sunglasses. They cut out the glare so all you have to do is admire the view.
